title: The Federal.... NEW North End Jr. 1 Beds - W/D in UNIT & CENTRAL AIR
posting_body: WE HAVE THE LARGEST EXCLUSIVE RENTAL INVENTORY IN THE NORTH END.
Core Property Group – 278 North Street Boston, MA 02113 - Open 7 Days a Week
Brand New Construction at the 50 yd line of Hanover Street in Boston’s Historic North End
THESE UNITS MUST BE SEEN IN PERSON.
UNIT 7 IS IN THE "B" STACK - SUNNY CORNER EXPOSURE!!!!
The "B" Stack offers a Rear Corner Exposure with great sunlight and city views.
As you go up, the views of the city only get better.
The Junior 1 bedrooms offer a separate kitchen and Living Area.
The two rooms are broken up by a large bathroom and closet where the IN UNIT LAUNDRY is located.
Enjoy both Central Air & Heat, as well as TV wall mount for your convenience.
All Units have Central Air and Laundry in Unit
Very Easy to Show in Person.
Please Call or Email Zach Barron for more assistance
I handle Condo & Multi Family Sales throughout the Downtown Boston Area.
I mainly cover the North End, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, Downtown/Fidi, Seaport, South Boston, Charlestown & West End.
Please contact Zach to Discuss ALL AVAILABILITY including OFF MARKET LISTINGS.
Please Call, Text, Email, or DM
THIS LISTING IS NOT A CO-BROKE ***
The apartments advertised may be rented.
Core Property Group is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Company.
